text: A Song of Ice and Fire is an award-winning series of fantasy novels written by George R. R. Martin. He began writing the series in 1991. Five books were released in the series and two were unfinished. It was translated into over twenty languages and is a best-seller, with the fourth volume reaching the top of the New York Times bestseller lists when it came out.'A Fantasy Realm Too Vile For Hobbits', New York Times article - December 2005 A fictional language, Dothraki, was introduced for the series. It was adapted into the Home Box Office television series Game of Thrones. == Books == * A Game of Thrones (1996) * A Clash of Kings (1998) * A Storm of Swords (2000) * A Feast for Crows (2005) * A Dance with Dragons (2011) * The Winds of Winter (TBA) * A Dream of Spring (TBA) == References ==
title: A Song of Ice and Fire
